attributes.action: Send more soldiers to Afghanistan, to give support to the other soldiers' out in Afghanistan to complete this mission.  With out the support  they can't win the war without the resources.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please support this petition to help our Major-General Andrew Mackay, May get his support for more soldiers' in Afghanistan.  We actually might be-able to complete this mission. Without the extra troops it can be a long long mission, and having unnecessary loss of our soldiers'

thanks Maria Dodsworth
